title: By the King. A proclamation to summon the persons therein named, who sate, gave judgment, and assisted in that horrid and detestable murder of His Majesties royal father of blessed memory, to appear and render themselves within fourteen days, under pain of being excepted from pardon
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,
notes: At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall, the sixth day of June 1660. in the twelfth year of our reign.
Steele notation: France, London harbour; Arms 61.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
